progress_bar.description: Companion to the ProgressManager plugin that fixes wrong messages being displayed on the ProgressBar

internal_logger_factory.description: Fixes Netty logging framework attempting to use SLF4J for logging, since Boson is shading it due to dependencies

game_data.description: Transforms GameData so that the fired events are shown on the ProgressBar

locale.description: Edits the Locale class so that it supports loading of JSON lang files

progress_manager.description: This modifies the Progress Bar screen so that Boson can show a higher resolution and better refined Progress Bar while loading

model_loader_variant_loader.description: Transforms ModelLoader$VariantLoader to allow blockstates to specify "" as a variant instead of "normal"

block_mob_spawner.description: Patches the Mob Spawner to list all possible mob spawner entries

load_controller.description: This edits the LoadController so that Boson can fire its LoadComplete event before other mods get a chance to

object_holder_registry.description: Transforms the ObjectHolderRegistry so that it fires an event whenever an Object Holder gets populated
